text: "She Has to Be Loved" is a 1989 song by New Zealand singer Jenny Morris. It is the second single from their second studio album Shiver and went to number 5 in Australia and number 3 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== 7-inch and cassette single # "She Has to Be Loved" – 4:05 # "Conscience" – 2:32 12-inch single # "She Has to Be Loved" (extended mix) – 6:18 # "She Has to Be Loved" – 4:05 # "Conscience" – 2:32 Mini-CD single # "She Has to Be Loved" – 4:05 # "Conscience" – 2:32 # "She Has to Be Loved" (extended mix) – 6:18 ==References== Category:1989 songs
title: She Has to Be Loved
